org.webcurator.core.permissionmapping
Class PermissionMappingStrategy

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.permissionmapping.PermissionMappingStrategy
Direct Known Subclasses:
HierarchicalPermissionMappingStrategy
public abstract class PermissionMappingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object

Generic class for the PermissionMappingStrategy. The strategy is used to find Permissions that match seeds. Different implementations may do this in different methods and may support different types of URL Patterns. In version 1.0 of the Web Curator Tool, the WCT uses the HierarchicalPermissionMappingStrategy.

Author:
bbeaumont
See Also:
HierarchicalPermissionMappingStrategy
